_instructions.purpose: Home page template with AI generation prompts
_instructions.usage: Generate dynamic home page content that showcases company strengths and expertise
_instructions.sections_count: Sections can be scaled - add/remove items based on company size and offerings
_instructions.icon_options: Available Lucide icons: award, clock, cog, wrench, truck, headphones, shield, shield-check, star, zap, settings, check-circle, trophy, users, globe, target, trending-up, thumbs-up, lightbulb, heart, cpu, gauge, calendar, package, phone, mail, map-pin

meta.title: [PROMPT] Generate SEO-optimized title: '{Company Name} - {Primary Service} | {Key Benefit/USP}' (max 60 chars)
meta.description: [PROMPT] Create compelling meta description highlighting company expertise, location, and main services (max 160 chars)

hero.type: [PROMPT] Choose hero type: 'video' for manufacturing/industrial, 'image' for service-based, 'carousel' for diverse offerings
hero.title: [PROMPT] Create powerful headline emphasizing precision/excellence in {industry} (e.g., 'Precision {Industry} Excellence', '{Industry} Innovation Leaders')
hero.subtitle: [PROMPT] Generate supporting subtitle describing main value proposition (e.g., 'Manufacturing superior components for critical applications')
hero.backgroundVideo: [PROMPT] For video hero: Find manufacturing/industrial video URL from approved video sources
hero.backgroundImage: [PROMPT] For image hero: Use Unsplash URL with search terms: {industry}, manufacturing, precision, industrial (min 2000px width)

cta.primary: [PROMPT] Generate primary CTA text ('Explore Products', 'View Services', 'Get Started')
cta.secondary: [PROMPT] Generate secondary CTA text ('Get Quote', 'Learn More', 'Contact Us')

whyChooseUs.enabled: [PROMPT] Set to true to enable section
whyChooseUs.title: [PROMPT] Generate section title highlighting company advantages ('Why Choose {Company}', 'Our Competitive Edge')
whyChooseUs.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle emphasizing excellence and expertise

items.icon: [PROMPT] Choose from available icons: award, shield-check, star, trophy (use exact name)
items.title: [PROMPT] Generate quality-focused benefit title
items.description: [PROMPT] Write description highlighting quality certifications, standards, and processes (2-3 sentences)

items.icon: [PROMPT] Choose from available icons: clock, calendar, trending-up (use exact name)
items.title: [PROMPT] Generate experience-focused title with years/expertise
items.description: [PROMPT] Write description emphasizing years of experience and track record

items.icon: [PROMPT] Choose from available icons: cog, cpu, zap, settings (use exact name)
items.title: [PROMPT] Generate technology/innovation focused title
items.description: [PROMPT] Write description about advanced equipment, processes, or innovation

items: [PROMPT] Add 1-3 more items based on company strengths using available icons: customer service (headphones, phone), global reach (globe), customization (wrench), etc.

aboutusintro.enabled: [PROMPT] Set to true to enable section
aboutusintro.title: [PROMPT] Generate about section title ('About {Company}', 'Our Story', 'Company Overview')
aboutusintro.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create descriptive subtitle about company positioning
aboutusintro.description: [PROMPT] Write compelling 3-4 sentence company introduction covering: founding year, industry focus, key services, and value proposition
aboutusintro.image: [PROMPT] Select professional company/industry image from Unsplash (search: {industry}, manufacturing, facility, professional)
highlights: [PROMPT] Include scale metrics (e.g., '500+ Product Variants', 'X+ Countries Served')

stats.enabled: [PROMPT] Set to true to enable section
stats.title: [PROMPT] Generate achievements title ('Our Achievements', 'Success Metrics', 'By the Numbers')
stats.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about delivering results/excellence

expertise.enabled: [PROMPT] Set to true to enable section
expertise.title: [PROMPT] Generate expertise title ('Our Industry Expertise', 'Industries We Serve', 'Sector Specialization')
expertise.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about specialized solutions/applications
expertise.description: [PROMPT] Write overview of industry expertise and quality standards (2-3 sentences)

sectors.name: [PROMPT] Industry name
sectors.description: [PROMPT] Write industry-specific description highlighting relevant products/services
applications: [PROMPT] Generate 4-6 specific applications/products for this industry

sectors: [PROMPT] Add 4-8 sectors based on company's actual target industries. Common sectors: automotive, electrical, construction, marine, aerospace, industrial, hvac, oil-gas

testimonials.enabled: [PROMPT] Set to true to enable section
testimonials.title: [PROMPT] Generate testimonials title ('Client Testimonials', 'What Our Clients Say', 'Customer Success Stories')
testimonials.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about trust/satisfaction

items.name: [PROMPT] Generate realistic client name
items.company: [PROMPT] Generate realistic company name in target industry
items.designation: [PROMPT] Generate appropriate job title (Purchase Manager, Director, etc.)
items.content: [PROMPT] Write authentic testimonial focusing on quality, delivery, service (2-3 sentences)
items.image: [PROMPT] Professional headshot from Unsplash (search: professional, business, portrait)

items.name: [PROMPT] Generate another realistic client name
items.content: [PROMPT] Write testimonial focusing on different aspects (long-term partnership, innovation, etc.)

items: [PROMPT] Add 1-8 more testimonials based on company size and client base

faqs.enabled: [PROMPT] Set to true to enable section
faqs.title: [PROMPT] Generate FAQ title ('Frequently Asked Questions', 'Common Questions', 'FAQ')
faqs.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create subtitle about providing information/clarity

items.question: [PROMPT] Generate question about order quantities/minimums
items.answer: [PROMPT] Provide realistic answer about MOQ policies

items.question: [PROMPT] Generate question about delivery/lead times
items.answer: [PROMPT] Provide realistic answer about typical timelines

items.question: [PROMPT] Generate question about quality assurance/certifications
items.answer: [PROMPT] Provide answer about quality processes and standards

items: [PROMPT] Add 2-10 more relevant FAQs based on industry: customization, materials, technical support, pricing, etc.

cta.enabled: [PROMPT] Set to true to enable section
cta.title: [PROMPT] Generate compelling CTA title ('Ready to Get Started?', 'Start Your Project Today', 'Experience Excellence')
cta.subtitle: [PROMPT] Create supporting text encouraging action (mention benefits, ease of starting, etc.)

primaryCTA.text: [PROMPT] Primary action text ('View Products', 'Get Quote', 'Contact Us')

secondaryCTA.text: [PROMPT] Secondary action text ('Contact Now', 'Call Us', 'Learn More')
